verses.verse: Then Nahash<WH5176> the Ammonite<WH5984> came up<WH5927>, and encamped<WH2583> against Jabesh-gilead<WH3003><WH1568>: and all the men<WH582> of Jabesh<WH3003> said<WH559> unto Nahash<WH5176>, Make<WH3772> a covenant<WH1285> with us, and we will serve<WH5647> thee.

¶ And the people<WH5971> said<WH559> unto Samuel<WH8050>, Who is he that said<WH559>, Shall Saul<WH7586> reign<WH4427> over us? bring<WH5414> the men<WH582>, that we may put them to death<WH4191>.
